If you're still studying, we offer a range of great opportunities for you that may even lead to you joining as a graduate in the future. If you're a penultimate year student or looking to complete a year in industry (YiI), start your journey on a placement with us.

If you're currently in your penultimate year, come and work with us for 10 weeks over the summer. You will gain valuable work experience which will put you in a good position to get on to one of our graduate schemes. The summer placement will give you the chance to get real hands-on experience in whichever area of work you chose.

We offer student placements in the following areas:
